Package index

All functions

CRC_subset
CRC subset data
assign_quadrants()
Assign SwitchClass quadrants
enrich_reactome_quadrants()
Reactome ORA per quadrant (using pathwayOverrepresent)
label_switch_classify()
Label-switch classification (with optional multicore)
plot_delta_vs_fc()
Scatter plot of delta vs fold-change with quadrant assignment
plot_feature_boxplots()
Boxplots for selected features across groups
plot_heatmap_quadrants()
Plot heatmap for quadrant-classified features
plot_umap()
Quick ggplot for UMAP embedding
run_umap_samples()
UMAP on samples using selected features
umap_triptych_by_delta()
UMAP triptych using delta-ranked features
